import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import SocketIOClient from 'socket.io-client' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import './chatRoom.css' import male_user from './img/male_user.png' // import famle_user from './img/women(1).png' const ChatRoom = props => { const massage = [ {id:Date.now(),mes:'سلام' , state:{name:'',gender:''}} ] const [text, setText] = useState('') const socket = React.useRef(SocketIOClient.connect("http://localhost:3010/socket")) console.log(socket); // useEffect(() => { // }, []) return (
صفحه اصلی چت روم
ali sarmadi
) } export default ChatRoom
